summary: As a Front End Developer, I was in charge of the development of our company's front-end dashboard, I used Next.js as the main framework and tailwind for styling the app. my main challenge in this role was to visualize various types of data. To address this, I integrated the chart.js library, which enabled the creation of responsive, customizable charts.

During my internship, I supported the QA team in testing and documentation to enhance the software's reliability and maintaining user experience. we used cypress for e2e testing and jsdoc for documenting the code.
